alert.note: Alert for Benton; Iowa (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 13 at 12:54PM CDT until May 13 at 1:30PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 130 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN BENTON AND NORTHEASTERN IOWA COUNTIES... At 1254 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Conroy, or near Marengo, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Public reported. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. This severe storm will be near... Conroy around 100 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Upper South Amana, Marengo, South Amana, Iowa County Fairgrounds, West Amana, High Amana, Middle Amana, Watkins, Walford, Blairstown and Norway. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CDT for east central Iowa.
